result.title: IM TIRED!!!!!
result.content:
So i know some people here, tourist and Petr.

I saw a lot of comments when idolize tourist, and i think, what happen here?

This blog will be downvoted cause nobody is valient to say the truth like it is.

tourist is a bumptious person, where is the lowliness? i know Petr, and its a nice guy really really paceful.

So if you think, he's smart and the best programmer in the world and he have the right to be like he is, you need to know be the best programmer is not at all, maybe if you think he made the best perfomance ever in icpc, that was a team not only him, he is the best programmer in the world, i bet you soon will exist another one who will be more smart.

So you don't need to think in how smart is somebody in competitive programming, you need to think in how smart is the person with other people, before of all, the person and not what he/she knows or he did it, be a better person no a better smug, integrity guys, integrity, balance in all ways..

Hope this blog will be deleted and downvoted, but this is the community when everybody needs to know the truth, not let you fanboy side allow you to stay under the man with highesth ranking, else get over of him/her.
